entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
